extendedInfo.description: The British are comingâ¦ Again! Itâs been twelve years since the war of 1812 and theBritish have reassembled and are seeking revenge for their ancestorâs losses. Takecontrol of the cannon and defend the Capitol against the relentless Redcoats. TheBritish have assembled an elite task force consisting of Redcoats, the Scottish Guardand the Green Dragoons. Green Dragoons are known for their savagery and disdainfor the American colonies and will stop at nothing to help the Redcoats take controlof the Capitol.Defend the Capitol with a barrage of weapons. Advance to the next level and useyour war funds to purchase upgrades that can help you defend your country. Thefate of Americaâs freedom rests in your hands. See if you have what it takes to fightoff the Redcoats and send them back to their country empty handedâ¦ Again!Upgrades to help you defend the Capitol:â¢ Guns - Add another gun.â¢ Grapeshot - Fires a spread of 5 bullets.â¢ Cannon - Smashes a column of enemies.â¢ Franklin Grenade - Damages troops in area of impact.â¢ Quickloader - Makes up for strength with speed.â¢ Fortifications - Increases the HP of all buildings.Disclaimer:With extensive testing and flawless game play on iOS, we have come to the conclusion you may encounter a very sporadic undesirable experience on Android.  We do save game play at the end of each level to ensure you will not lose your progress.Keywords: Tower defense,war,troops,revolution,army,cannon,shooting,guns,grenade,war game,duty,shoot,british,america,war,revolution,army,cannon,shooting, guns,grenade,fun game,war game,duty,shoot
